instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-01598-A no backlight
threads.message: Hey, guys im having problem with this board, no backlight. Tested with good new display.

threads.title: 820-01598-A no backlight
threads.message:
PP5V_S0_BKLT_D - 5V
BKLT_EN_R 5V
PP5V_G3S 5V
BKLT_SCL 5V
BKLT_SENSE_OUT 0V
LCDBKLT_FB 1.8V
BKLT_PWM_KEYB 0V
With no u8400 placed

threads.title: 820-01598-A no backlight
threads.message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Do you mean these signals have been measured without U8400 soldered on the board?

Isn't this machine still under warranty?
Check if the LCD assembly can still be changed under Apple program.

threads.title: 820-01598-A no backlight
threads.message: its not lcd problem, because tested new good one. still no bl. and measeured without u8400 on board yes.

threads.title: 820-01598-A no backlight
threads.message:
What do you expect to get without U8400???
Please solder it back and post signals.

threads.title: 820-01598-A no backlight
threads.message:
PP5V_S0_BKLT_D - 5V
BKLT_EN_R 5V
PP5V_G3S 5V
BKLT_SCL 5V
BKLT_SENSE_OUT 3.2V
LCDBKLT_FB 0.1V
BKLT_PWM_KEYB 140mV
u8400 soldered

threads.title: 820-01598-A no backlight
threads.message: Post BKLT_SD level and voltage at both pins of D8410.
